aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text_0:
I started working with programming in 2012, creating sites using PHP, Javascript, CSS and HTML.
In 2013 I started using Mysql to build more elaborate sites and blogs.
aboutMe.text_1: In 2016 I started studying C# and Object Oriented Programming to create libraries that facilitated the development of projects in the Unity Engine. In that year I also worked with the optimization of websites for contractors.
aboutMe.text_2: In 2017 I started working at Reploy Soluções Corporativas ("Reploy Corporate Solutions"), where I still work developing systems and apps using Java, Node.js, MariaDB, Mssql, Ionic, Angular and JSF.
aboutMe.text_3: I'm a professional and a programming enthusiast, and always seeking for opportunities to learn and grow personally and professionally. I look forward to a degree in an academic institution whose core values are excellence and innovation.
